main event: A disk-shaped object with red on the top and lower part with flashing lights was observed for 15 minutes at Bitburg AB, Germany.
interesting points: The object was observed by ground radar.
The object was described as too slow for a plane.
The observers made a positive report on the sighting.
A separate sighting of an unusual bright white object that was more brilliant than the stars was observed for 4-5 minutes at Bitburg AB, Germany.
The second sighting involved a controlled, flickering white motion.
sighted object: disk-shaped object with red on top and bottom, flashing lights
